subject: Speakers used - for RS 12-469??
author: judy_in_hollywood
full_text: Hi All, Just wondering wat kinds of speakers your using for this model, to record from? I have "El Cheap-O" 99c Store ZMEX Mini Speakers, but they seem to be hard to hear (not enough volume)!  Thanks.  Will those small computer external speakers work by pluggng them into the earphone jack????  =Judy=
